mergeParams.query: select a.PRIMARY_ID as "PRIMARY_ID",a.limitrefno as "limitRefNo",a.currency as "currency",a.currencyDisplayName as "currencyDisplayName",a.counterpartyGroupNameDisplayName as "counterpartyName", a.counterpartyGroupName as "counterpartyGroupName" ,a.limitStatus as "limitStatus",a.limitStatusDisplayName as "limitStatusDisplayName",a.counterpartyGroupNameDisplayName as "counterpartyGroupNameDisplayName",a.creditLimitSource as "creditLimitSource", a.creditLimitSourceDisplayName as "creditLimitSourceDisplayName", a.creditLimitType as "creditLimitType" ,a.creditLimitTypeDisplayName as "creditLimitTypeDisplayName",a.amount as "amount",a.coverPercentage as "coverPercentage",a.maxPaymentTerm as "maxPaymentTerm", a.remarks as "remarks",a.referenceNo as "referenceNo", a.fromPeriod as "fromPeriod", a.toPeriod  as "toPeriod",a.sys__UUID as "sys__UUID",a.sys__createdon as "sys__createdOn", a.sys__updatedon  as "sys__updatedOn" ,a._id as "mongoId",a.object as "object" ,a.refTypeId as "refTypeId", a.refType as "refType", a.sys__data__State as "sys__data__state"  from LIMITMAINTENANCE_LISTING_CONNECT_DATA a
